filmography.title: Red-Headed Woman
filmography.role_description: A wealthy businessman who becomes the target of a ruthless, social-climbing secretary.
filmography.plot: A young woman uses sex and manipulation to break up a marriage and advance her social standing.

filmography.title: Liliom
filmography.role_description: A charming but brutish carnival barker who is given a chance to return from heaven to redeem himself.
filmography.plot: After committing suicide, a carousel barker is allowed to return to Earth for one day to make amends to his daughter.

filmography.title: Private Worlds
filmography.role_description: A conservative psychiatrist who clashes with his female colleague while dealing with his own family demons.
filmography.plot: The staff of a mental hospital deal with their own personal demons while treating patients.

filmography.title: Break of Hearts
filmography.role_description: A brilliant but womanizing conductor who falls in love with an aspiring composer, leading to a tumultuous marriage.
filmography.plot: A young composer marries a famous orchestra conductor, but his infidelity threatens to destroy their relationship.

filmography.title: The Garden of Allah
filmography.role_description: A Trappist monk who flees his monastery to find himself, falling in love with a woman in the Sahara desert.
filmography.plot: A monk breaks his vows and flees to the desert, where he marries a devout woman without revealing his secret.

filmography.title: Mayerling
filmography.role_description: The Austrian Crown Prince who engages in a tragic, doomed romance with a young baroness.
filmography.plot: The true story of the tragic love affair between Crown Prince Rudolph of Austria and Baroness Mary Vetsera.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Foreign Film

filmography.title: History Is Made at Night
filmography.role_description: A suave Parisian headwaiter who falls for an American woman trying to divorce her jealous shipping magnate husband.
filmography.plot: A jealous ship owner tries to frame his wife's lover for a crime, leading to a dramatic confrontation on an iceberg-struck liner.

filmography.title: Conquest
filmography.role_description: The French Emperor who engages in a passionate affair with the Polish Countess Marie Walewska.
filmography.plot: The story of the romance between Napoleon Bonaparte and the Polish Countess Marie Walewska, set against the backdrop of European conquest.

filmography.title: Algiers
filmography.role_description: A notorious French jewel thief hiding in the Casbah of Algiers who risks everything for a beautiful tourist.
filmography.plot: A thief hiding in the Casbah is lured out of safety by a beautiful French woman, leading to his capture.

filmography.title: Love Affair
filmography.role_description: A French playboy who falls in love with an American woman on a cruise, agreeing to meet six months later at the Empire State Building.
filmography.plot: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship, but a tragic accident threatens their reunion.

filmography.title: All This, and Heaven Too
filmography.role_description: An unhappy French aristocrat who falls in love with his children's governess, leading to a scandalous murder-suicide.
filmography.plot: A governess is accused of having an affair with a French Duke and inciting him to murder his wife.

filmography.title: Back Street
filmography.role_description: A banker who maintains a long-term affair with a woman who sacrifices her own life to be his mistress.
filmography.plot: A woman loves a man who is married to someone else, living in the shadows as his mistress for decades.

filmography.title: Hold Back the Dawn
filmography.role_description: A Romanian gigolo stuck in Mexico who marries a naive American teacher to gain entry into the United States.
filmography.plot: A European refugee marries an American schoolteacher in Mexico to get a visa, but finds himself falling in love with her.

filmography.title: Tales of Manhattan
filmography.role_description: A matinee idol who wears a cursed tailcoat during an affair that ends in tragedy.
filmography.plot: An anthology film following a black tailcoat as it passes between different owners, affecting each of their lives.

filmography.title: The Constant Nymph
filmography.role_description: A self-absorbed composer who marries a wealthy woman but is loved by her younger, musical cousin.
filmography.plot: A young girl falls in love with a composer who marries her cousin, but he eventually realizes his true muse was the girl all along.

filmography.title: Flesh and Fantasy
filmography.role_description: A circus high-wire artist who has nightmares of falling, in a supernatural anthology film.
filmography.plot: An anthology of three supernatural tales, including one about a circus performer haunted by a vision of doom.

filmography.title: Gaslight
filmography.role_description: A charming but sinister husband who systematically manipulates his wife's reality to drive her insane.
filmography.plot: A woman is slowly driven mad by her husband, who is trying to hide his criminal past and find hidden jewels in their home.

filmography.title: Together Again
filmography.role_description: A sculptor hired to create a statue for a small town who falls in love with the female mayor.
filmography.plot: A female mayor of a small town falls for a sculptor she hires to make a statue of her late husband.

filmography.title: Cluny Brown
filmography.role_description: A charming Czech refugee and writer who encourages a plumber's niece to break social conventions.
filmography.plot: A free-spirited girl is sent to work as a maid in a country manor, where she falls for a charming Czech refugee.

filmography.title: Arch of Triumph
filmography.role_description: A refugee doctor living illegally in Paris before WWII who seeks revenge on a Nazi officer while falling in love.
filmography.plot: In 1938 Paris, a refugee doctor and a woman with a past try to find happiness while avoiding deportation.

filmography.title: The Thirteenth Letter
filmography.role_description: An older doctor in a Canadian village who becomes involved in a mystery surrounding poison pen letters.
filmography.plot: Residents of a small Quebec town begin receiving poison pen letters, leading to suspicion and tragedy.

filmography.title: The Earrings of Madame de...
filmography.role_description: A wealthy general who gives his wife diamond earrings, setting off a chain of events involving love, betrayal, and tragedy.
filmography.plot: A pair of earrings passed from person to person reveals the deceptions and tragedies of a wealthy couple.

filmography.title: The Cobweb
filmography.role_description: The alcoholic head of a psychiatric clinic who struggles to maintain control amidst staff infighting.
filmography.plot: Staff and patients at a psychiatric clinic clash over drapes for the library, revealing deep personal dysfunctions.

filmography.title: Fanny
filmography.role_description: A bar owner in Marseille who navigates the romantic entanglements of his son and the titular Fanny.
filmography.plot: A young woman marries an older man to give her unborn child a father when her true love leaves for the sea.

filmography.title: How to Steal a Million
filmography.role_description: A wealthy art dealer in Paris who is a potential buyer for a forged sculpture.
filmography.plot: A woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries is assisted by a man.

filmography.title: Barefoot in the Park
filmography.role_description: An eccentric, bohemian neighbor who charms the mother of a newlywed bride living in the same apartment building.
filmography.plot: A conservative young lawyer and his free-spirited bride try to adapt to married life in a tiny Greenwich Village apartment.

filmography.title: Stavisky...
filmography.role_description: An elegant aristocrat and confidant to the swindler Stavisky in 1930s France.
filmography.plot: The true story of Alexandre Stavisky, a small-time con man who rose to the top of French society and caused a political scandal.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Best Actor (Special Mention); NYFCC: Win – Best Supporting Actor
